text: Hoyer Praises Appointment of Mary Lacey as Program Executive Officer for the National Security Personn
label: HH1

text: WASHINGTON, DC -  Congressman Steny Hoyer released the following statement today
label: TITLE

text: following the Department of Defense announcement that Mary E. Lacey, currently the technical
label: BODY

text: director of the Naval Surface Warfare Center of the Naval Sea Systems Command, and
label: BODY

text: formerly the Executive Director of the Naval Surface Warfare Center, Indian Head, Maryland,
label: BODY

text: Division, has been appointed as the program executive officer for the National Security
label: BODY

text: Personnel System (NSPS) by Secretary of the Navy Gordon England.
label: BODY

text: "Secretary England made an outstanding choice today in appointing Mary Lacey as one of his
label: BODY

text: top advisors and head of the NSPS Program Executive Office.  As a personal friend, I have long
label: BODY

text: witnessed Mary's impressive leadership ability and unmatched expertise in her field.  I am
label: BODY

text: especially grateful for her tremendous contributions to our region through her work at Indian
label: BODY

text: Head and NAVSEA.
label: BODY

text: "Mary will unquestionably be missed by the men and women who served with her at Indian
label: BODY

text: Head and the thousands of civilian employees who have benefited from her work on their
label: BODY

text: behalf.  Mary is currently manages over 16,000 employees - more than 9,000 of whom are
label: BODY

text: currently in one of the Department of Defense's personnel demonstration projects.
label: BODY

text: "I have no doubt that in her new position, she will be able to use her substantial experience and
label: BODY

text: valuable insight to ensure that our robust civilian workforce has the tools and resources they
label: BODY

text: need to continue the important work they are doing to protect our nation.
label: BODY

text: "We are very fortunate to have a native Marylander assuming this important post that will have
label: BODY

text: a major impact on the lives of the federal employees living in Southern Maryland.  I am grateful
label: BODY

text: that Secretary England has recognized what an asset Mary is to our federal civilian workforce
label: BODY

text: and look forward to continuing to work closely with her when she assumes her new position."
label: BODY
